00020 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/static_cast.hpp"
00021 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/nttp.hpp"
00022 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/static_constant.hpp"
00023 #include "boost/mpl/aux_/config/workaround.hpp"
00024 
00025 #include "boost/preprocessor/cat.hpp"
00026 
00027 #if !defined(AUX_WRAPPER_NAME)
00028 #   define AUX_WRAPPER_NAME BOOST_PP_CAT(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE,_)
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 #if !defined(AUX_WRAPPER_PARAMS)
00032 #   define AUX_WRAPPER_PARAMS(N) BOOST_MPL_AUX_NTTP_DECL(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, N)
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 #if !defined(AUX_WRAPPER_INST)
00036 #   if BOOST_WORKAROUND(__MWERKS__, <= 0x2407)
00037 #       define AUX_WRAPPER_INST(value) AUX_WRAPPER_NAME< value >
00038 #   else 
00039 #       define AUX_WRAPPER_INST(value) mpl::AUX_WRAPPER_NAME< value >
00040 #   endif
00041 #endif
00042 
00043 namespace boost { namespace mpl {
00044 
00045 template< AUX_WRAPPER_PARAMS(N) >
00046 struct AUX_WRAPPER_NAME
00047 {
00048     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, value = N);
00049 // agurt, 08/mar/03: SGI MIPSpro C++ workaround, have to #ifdef because some 
00050 // other compilers (e.g. MSVC) are not particulary happy about it
00051 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(__EDG_VERSION__, <= 238)
00052     typedef struct AUX_WRAPPER_NAME type;
00053 #else
00054     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_NAME type;
00055 #endif
00056     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE value_type;
00057 
00058 // have to #ifdef here: some compilers don't like the 'N + 1' form (MSVC),
00059 // while some other don't like 'value + 1' (Borland), and some don't like
00060 // either
00061 #if BOOST_WORKAROUND(__EDG_VERSION__, <= 243)
00062  private:
00063     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, next_value = BOOST_MPL_AUX_STATIC_CAST(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, (N + 1)));
00064     BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, prior_value = BOOST_MPL_AUX_STATIC_CAST(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, (N - 1)));
00065  public:
00066     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_INST(next_value) next;
00067     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_INST(prior_value) prior;
00068 #elif BOOST_WORKAROUND(__BORLANDC__, BOOST_TESTED_AT(0x561)) \
00069     || BOOST_WORKAROUND(__IBMCPP__, BOOST_TESTED_AT(502)) \
00070     || BOOST_WORKAROUND(__HP_aCC, BOOST_TESTED_AT(53800))
00071     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_INST( BOOST_MPL_AUX_STATIC_CAST(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, (N + 1)) ) next;
00072     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_INST( BOOST_MPL_AUX_STATIC_CAST(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, (N - 1)) ) prior;
00073 #else
00074     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_INST( BOOST_MPL_AUX_STATIC_CAST(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, (value + 1)) ) next;
00075     typedef AUX_WRAPPER_INST( BOOST_MPL_AUX_STATIC_CAST(AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE, (value - 1)) ) prior;
00076 #endif
00077 
00078     // enables uniform function call syntax for families of overloaded 
00079     // functions that return objects of both arithmetic ('int', 'long',
00080     // 'double', etc.) and wrapped integral types (for an example, see 
00081     // "mpl/example/power.cpp")
00082     operator AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE() const { return static_cast<AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE>(this->value); } 
00083 };
00084 
00085 #if !defined(BOOST_NO_INCLASS_MEMBER_INITIALIZATION)
00086 template< AUX_WRAPPER_PARAMS(N) >
00087 AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE const AUX_WRAPPER_INST(N)::value;
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 }} // namespace boost::mpl
00091 
00092 #undef AUX_WRAPPER_NAME
00093 #undef AUX_WRAPPER_PARAMS
00094 #undef AUX_WRAPPER_INST
00095 #undef AUX_WRAPPER_VALUE_TYPE
